comment: th October1989 the IRA murdered Thomas Gibson, . Married father of mth old daughter. Labourer shot sitting in car, Kilrea. Waiting for van to collect him to work in Ballymoney on home for elderly. Working extra hours as trying to build house. TA Lance Corporal. The Territorial Army as it was then known, wasn't mobilised or used at all in NI.
